tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_time TIMESTAMP,
    carbon_emission_level DECIMAL(10,2)
);
CREATE TABLE transportation_data (   id INT PRIMARY KEY,   location VARCHAR(255),   carbon_emissions DECIMAL(10, 2),   timestamp TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE vehicle_info (   vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),   fuel_type VARCHAR(50),   emissions_standard VARCHAR(50) );

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    carbon_level FLOAT NOT NULL
);
